CustomField.description: Alternatively specifies the the SObject Type, via text definition, for this relationship. Note that specifying with the "Binding SObject" field is preferred. In some cases, the Entity Relationship does not present the desired SObject Type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Alternatively specifies the the SObject Type, via text definition, for this relationship. Note that specifying with the "Binding SObject" field is preferred. In some cases, the Entity Relationship does not present the desired SObject Type.
CustomField.label: Binding SObject Alternate
